column2: "You can't master a weapon overnight. The more you practice, the better you'll become."
"There might be things you struggle with at first. But if you stick with your training, they will become easier and easier."
"It's the same way with all of my students. Just follow my lead, and don't worry too much."

"When you learn the skill \"Knuckle Gear\", a Gear Gauge is added to the top of your Weapon Palette.

You can fill the Gear Gauge by attacking with Knuckles."

"As the Gear Gauge fills, your attack speed rises, giving you an advantage in battle.

The Gear Gauge empties when you stop attacking."
